p: The cumulative incidence of notified cases per 100,000 residents were 335.1 in Anzio, 4,263 in Guardavalle Marina, from 1.6 to 13.9 in Rome [ 7], 5,389 in Castiglione di Cervia, 2,508 in Castiglione di Ravenna, and 1.3 in Bologna [ 9]. A seroprevalence study found that 10.2% of the population in Castiglione di Cervia and Castiglione di Ravenna had been exposed to CHIKV in 2007 [ 29]; similar proportions were estimated in Poletti and colleagues [ 26]. No results from serosurveys are yet available for the 2017 outbreak.
